text: Warren Julius Ajax (May 12, 1921 – December 19, 2004) was an American professional basketball player. He played in the National Basketball League for the Minneapolis Lakers during the 1947–48 season and averaged 0.3 points per game. == References == Category:1921 births Category:2004 deaths Category:American men's basketball players Category:Basketball players from Minnesota Category:Centers (basketball) Category:Forwards (basketball) Category:Minneapolis Lakers players Category:Minnesota Golden Gophers men's basketball players Category:Sportspeople from Minneapolis
title: Warren Ajax
